name: Mafia Word Online
description:
Hustle from a petty thief to become the international mafia boss by robbing stores, pickpocketing, trading drugs and various crimes. Become an industrialist by building mines and factories to dominate the world economy

Play with your friends and co-operate by bailing each other out of jail and doing hostage missions together - in a world inside Google Maps, with interactive mini-games to earn money.
